All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Command
Class for the command object which is responsible for transitions between states
Command.CommandValue
Represents the constant values possible for Commands
Command.Resolution
Represents the constants for the Issue states
Issue
Class for managing and modifying Issue objects
Issue.IssueType
Represents the constant values for the types of issues
IssueList
Class responsible for managing the list of issues
IssueManager
Class responsible for managing issues
IssueManagerGUI
Container for the IssueManager that has the menu options for new issue files, loading existing files, saving files and quitting.
IssueReader
Class for reading Issues from a file
IssueWriter
Class for writing Issues to a file
